name: date-x
description: Library to handle dates in a custom date format.

scripts.travis: istanbul cover --include-all-sources ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -v --root ./lib --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Laszlo Szikszai <sziklaszlo@gmail.com>
